creditline: Collection of David Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description:
[K-30]

inside a cream carton with printed white branches; wooden box with inscriptions on interior and exterior of box; wrapped in yellow tissue with bubble wrap around roller and paper under tie; fabric is orange with a teal accent; bone roller; image of five lines of text in black; three chops, two square below L line of script and one rectangular in UR next to script; large red flower with foliage below
title: Red Chrysanthemum
